mapper.select: SELECT s.STUDENT_CODE,sc.CODE_NAME,m.MEMBER_NAME,m.MEMBER_ADDR,m.MEMBER_BIRTH,m.MEMBER_PHONE,m.MEMBER_EMAIL,m.MEMBER_PICTURE FROM MEMBER m join STUDENT s on m.member_id= s.MEMBER_ID join ST_STATE_CODE sc on s.STATE_CODE=sc.STATE_CODE where m.MEMBER_ID=#{param1}

SELECT m.mj_type,d.DEPARTMENT_NAME,d.DEPARTMENT_CODE,c.COLLEGE_NAME,c.COLLEGE_CODE FROM MJ_RECORD m join DEPARTMENT d on m.department_code=d.DEPARTMENT_CODE join COLLEGE c on d.college_code = c.COLLEGE_CODE where m.student_code=#{param1}
SELECT grade,PERSONAL_SEMESTER,TOTAL_CREDIT FROM ST_STATE WHERE STUDENT_CODE=#{param1}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM SM_STATE WHERE STUDENT_CODE=#{param1}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM ABSENCE WHERE STUDENT_CODE=#{param1}

SELECT r.SUBJECT_CODE,r.RECORD_GRADE,r.RECORD_SEMESTER,r.RETAKE_CHECK,r.RECORD_LEVEL,s.SUBJECT_NAME,s.SUBJECT_CREDIT,s.SUBJECT_TYPE FROM RECORD r JOIN SUBJECT s on r.SUBJECT_CODE =s.SUBJECT_CODE where r.STUDENT_CODE=#{param1}

SELECT r.SUBJECT_CODE,r.RECORD_GRADE,r.RECORD_SEMESTER,r.RETAKE_CHECK,r.RECORD_LEVEL,s.SUBJECT_NAME,s.SUBJECT_CREDIT,s.SUBJECT_TYPE FROM RECORD r JOIN SUBJECT s on r.SUBJECT_CODE =s.SUBJECT_CODE where r.STUDENT_CODE=#{student_code} and r.RECORD_GRADE=${grade} and r.RECORD_SEMESTER=${semester}
